data.name: Star Conflict: Vigilant pack
data.detailed_description:
Attention! All the ships included in the packs are delivered assembled. Re-equipment is possible for in-game currency.
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on one account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This bundle includes:

  • Empire rank 14 destroyer Vigilant
  • Unique destroyer weapon - Vacuum resonance laser.
  • When the beam is held on the target for more than 0.5 s., all other enemies within a radius of 500 meters receive additional damage for 5 seconds.

Unique destroyer module

Active module “Remote minelayer”.
Launches a self-propelled mine, activated upon impact or by timer. After activation, the mine is invisible. It is triggered if the target moves away from it within a detonation radius of 500 m., or after 120 s.
CPU modifier ”Vulnerability Detector”.
Reduces the resistance to damage of all enemies within a radius of 2200 m. You can install only one modifier of this type.

In addition, pilots will receive special weapons for support class destroyers:

  • Active module “Photon emitter”
  • Active module “Gravitational lens”

    “Iceberg” colouring scheme

    A fine example of Imperial shipbuilding, the Vigilant destroyer was designed by order of the Inquisition, as a response to the sharply increased activity of the Revenant cult. The project was personally overseen by a special agent Miranda del Arte. The Inquisition is well acquainted with the activities of the order. The two organizations that have undergone tremendous metamorphosis since then have confronted each other in the days of the old Direktorium. Despite the initially narrow specification, the Vigilant turned out to be a multipurpose combat vehicle. Soon it was put into service, and the blueprints submitted to the UMC.

data.short_description: This bundle includes:Empire rank 14 destroyer Vigilant Unique destroyer weapon - Vacuum resonance laser. When the beam is held on the target for more than 0.5 s., all other enemies within a radius of 500 meters receive additional damage for 5 seconds.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz, Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 6 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 6 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
